text: I have a very good experience with Dr. Michael Glick and his staff. And some friends whom I recommended to see him said the same thing.

text: Dr. Glick was very thorough and did not make me feel rushed. He took his time to explain his recommendations and was transparent about cost. Very knowledgeable, I recommend!

name: Initials hidden
text: Excellent visit. Made you feel at home, very comfortable throughout entire visit. Never felt rushed. Highly recommend!

name: Initials hidden
text: Dr Glick is caring and nice. My colonoscopy went well and painless. There was a small problem of billing for my procedure. He took care of it once I brought it to him.

text: Dr Glick is nice and patient and knowledgeable!

name: Initials hidden
text: Very intelligent and helpful.  Very accessible.  Has helped tremendously.

text: Dr Glick is very bright, patient and made me feel at ease. I came in feeling hopeless and I feel confident that with him, I will find a solution to my chronic acid reflux.

name: Helen M., verified patient
text: Dr. Flick was very knowledgeable and helped me solve the problems I was having. I’m as good as new!

name: Initials hidden
text: Excellent Doctor. Dr. Glick is a real professional and simultaneously made me feel comfortable while adeptly diagnosing my issues. His office is run like a well oiled machine. I wish all modern doctors offices would take notice!

text: Dr. Glick is one of the best doctors I've ever had. He's attentive, insanely intelligent and just a lovely person. He is also incredibly thorough; I know I'm getting the best care possible with him. I wish all doctors were more like Dr. Glick!

text:
Great Doc 
Glad I made the choice

name: Initials hidden
text: Dr. Glick was very friendly, attentive and professional - he made me feel right at ease from the moment we met. And discussed the procedure I was referred to have done. I highly recommend this doctor as he has a very good “bedside manner!”

name: Jason F., verified patient
text: Dr. Glick was great.  Super fast, great bedside manner.  Broke the whole thing down and made it easy to understand and removed all my concerns quickly.   Couldn’t have asked for a better experience.

text: Very knowledgeable. Extremely nice, attentive, and took his time. Have visited other gastroenterologists before.. Dr. Glick has been the best thus far.

name: Initials hidden

text: I came because I thought I might have a thrombosis in my leg. The team was super informed and made me feel like I was in great hands. It turned out I was fine, but had I not been, this would have been the place I had felt comfortable.

name: Patrick M., verified patient
text:
Excellent

text: Excellent cardiology practice. Very well organized, friendly and knowledgeable staff. Modern facility, conveniently located to E and M trains. Dr. Welch is an expert at what he does. Highly recommend.

text: His staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Dr. Welch has an excellent beside manner and I could not be happier with my appointment.

text: nice doctor. listened and took the time to explain things.

text: The MD, along with the entire staff, were professional, friendly, and efficient.  Everything was explained and the they gave you time to ask any questions.  I would highly recommend!

name: Lauren G., verified patient
text: Dr Welch and the Nurse Practitioners were absolutely wonderful.  I was asked all the right questions and I felt that my responses were being heard - so the appropriate tests were taken.  Dr Welch genuinely cared about my condition and helped me feel at ease. I highly recommend him!!

name: Gale B., verified patient
text: very down to earth and caring

text: Dr. Trotman was very helpful, pleasant and thorough in her examination and explanation of results. She gave recommendations and dispelled my anxiety. She was an amazing professional and I look to more visits with her.

name: Sandra B., verified patient
text: Very Professional and courteous. Shows Empathy and concern. Takes her time and ask questions also listens to patients concerns. Wait time wasn't bad either. Suggest you make early appointment because she gets busy.

text: she was very friendly and listened to my concern. She took the extra steps and order the necessary exam.

name: Alan D., verified patient
text: I don’t think I’ll have to go to another doctor again.  Incredibly comfortable and conversational. And she was able to see me on a day when 99% of the other doctors were not seeing anyone. I’m incredibly appreciative.

name: Susan S., verified patient
text: I am so glad that I went to Dr. Kranthi and feel fortunate to have found her practice. She is very caring, a good listener, knowledgeable, and professional.  The facilities are comforting and clean.

name: Helge T., verified patient
text: Really helpful and good explanations, too. No wait time.

name: Brundha K., verified patient
text: She was very kind and her staff is amazing. The office is very large and clean. She made sure to take care of my problem and gave me education sheets to help me get better soon. Very Happy with my visit!!!

name: Agata Z., verified patient
text: NO wait time and the entire staff was super friendly yet professional! Dr. Kranthi answered all of my questions and addressed all of my concerns. I will definitely go for my follow up. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a family Dr.

name: Whitney T., verified patient
text: Wonderful people, very observant and kind.

name: Vu N., verified patient
text: Irina is absolutely amazing! I’ve had some pain for the past few weeks that was coupled with muscle tightness and in 1 session I felt like a brand new person. Highly recommended!!

name: Kathryn B., verified patient
text: Irina (and everyone I've seen at the practice) was so warm, personal, and welcoming, and willing to take the time to talk me through every part of a treatment that I was new to doing. I really appreciate their time and kindness.

name: Nikita M., verified patient
text: Irina is subject matter expert. Effective, puts patients first. She manages a great team who is friendly, professional and knowledgable.

name: Daniel K., verified patient
text: The best!

text: Parnia was fantastic!

text:
I can't stop saying great things about Irina and Joannie.  I came for neck/ upper back pain which has now gone away but I stuck with them because they're so great.

Location is great to the train and they easily accommodate your schedule.

name: Sean B., verified patient
text: Irina and her staff are lovely - attentive, great listeners, and really invested in your health. I'll definitely be seeing her again!

name: Bradley K., verified patient
text: Exceeded my expectations.

text: Irina is amazing. I've been suffering from back pain for as long as I can remember. In just my first session I felt a difference. She really took the time to take a full intake and is treating me with a very holistic approach.

text: Irina was so nice and I felt like she really understood the issue I was having.  She was very professional and she answered all of my questions.  I am definitely going to go back for additional treatments!

I was seen by the receptionist upon arrival and was called into the room quickly then seen by the doctor almost immediately.  I was actually out of the office within a half an hour and that was with removing my cast and X-rays.
Always professional!

name: Stephanie N., verified patient
text: Everyone at the office is friendly, thorough, attentive, and generally great! I was especially happy with how long Dr. Verzosa was willing to speak with me and really listen to my concerns and talk through various solutions.

name: Carolyn R., verified patient
text: I have seen Dr Verzosa once for me and once for my daughter.  He was thorough, diligent, informative and kind.  He proactively followed up with me on test results for my daughter and then again to see how she was feeling.  Wonderful!

name: Megan G., verified patient
text: Dr. Verzosa was very knowledgeable, personable, thorough and considerate.

name: Johann S., verified patient
text: Dr. Verzosa is thorough and explains all treatment plans and possible diagnoses well. I enjoy his bedside manner, and I highly recommend to anyone.

name: Initials hidden
text: I have been to Dr Verzosa several times and my impression is that he is personable and thorough, not rushed, and an attentive listener. The nursing staff and front office staff are also professional and pleasant. The facilities are sparkling new.

text: Dr. Verzosa is wonderful, highly recommend.

text:

Walked away feeling very secure that my concerns would be well attended.

name: Lara W., verified patient
text: Fast and efficient.  This was the 4th doctor I had seen since my wrist was broken and this doctor did not make me feel paranoid about not having surgery.

name: Susan Y., verified patient
text: It was a great experience. I went in with a broken finger. He answered all of my questions and concerns, explained the break to me, and had me fitted immediately with a splint and it's already starting to feel better than before. So, all round a great experience.

name: Samantha B., verified patient
text: I have seen him twice now for two different accidents and he is extremely knowledgeable. He did a surgery on my thumb 2 years ago and when I recently injured my finger I looked him up again because I know he is the best

name: Christopher C., verified patient
text:
I was seen by the receptionist upon arrival and was called into the room quickly then seen by the doctor almost immediately.  I was actually out of the office within a half an hour and that was with removing my cast and X-rays.
Always professional!

text: Went for a followup after a suggested MRI was done. Prior treatment from Dr Mohrmann seems to have cured my issues. Excellent practise.

text: While Dr. Mohrmann is a bit clinical in tone, he's very clear and was incredibly knowledgable.  He explained in perfectly confident detail what was going on with my hand (I had a slightly torn tendon).

name: John S., verified patient
text: He was very dismissive  and told me physical therapy was the only way I can go no cure just do physical therapy

name: Initials hidden
text: I think that Highline orthopedics is certainly competent but the problem is they don't spend enough time with each patient. The schedule is approximately 10 minutes per patient and that sometimes does not leave enough time with the doctor

name: Alexandra L., verified patient
text: Awful bedside manner. Couldn't have made less of an effort. Seemed put out that he had to see a patient. Then walked in on me changing... no knock. Very dismissive and didn't explain findings of ultrasound work.

text: Very courteous and knowledgeable.  Fixed me up right away!  Thank you Dr. Mohrmann!

name: Samantha B., verified patient
text: I have seen him twice now for two different accidents and he is extremely knowledgeable. He did a surgery on my thumb 2 years ago and when I recently injured my finger I looked him up again because I know he is the best

name: Christopher C., verified patient
text:
I was seen by the receptionist upon arrival and was called into the room quickly then seen by the doctor almost immediately.  I was actually out of the office within a half an hour and that was with removing my cast and X-rays.
Always professional!

name: Padmanabhan R., verified patient
text: Went for a followup after a suggested MRI was done. Prior treatment from Dr Mohrmann seems to have cured my issues. Excellent practise.

name: Padmanabhan R., verified patient
text: Very short wait used doing the paperwork. Very professional environment, friendly and competent staff, and all the equipment needed to make a diagnosis and start treatment. Dr. Mohrmann was quick to identify and treat the issues I had, and his support staff took care of the rest.

text: he addressed  the issues

name: Initials hidden
text: The entire staff was very friendly and welcoming.  I felt very comfortable and confident in that they will be able to fix my injury.  The x-rays and diagnosis were very quick and to the point.  I have to undergo surgery so this is the extent of my current experience.

name: Emily M., verified patient
text: While Dr. Mohrmann is a bit clinical in tone, he's very clear and was incredibly knowledgable.  He explained in perfectly confident detail what was going on with my hand (I had a slightly torn tendon).

name: Paul J., verified patient
text: Excellent service. Same day appointment. No hassle and courteous. Professional and great bedside manner.

name: Darryl P., verified patient
text: The staff was warm and receptive, very helpful. Everything was exceptional.

name: Karina U., verified patient
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Mohrmann for a while now and I would highly recommend him.

name: Olamide N., verified patient
text: The visit was informative and friendly. He didn't seem rushed to leave and heard all of my concerns. Went above and beyond. Exactly what I want from a doctor visit and I'll be returning!

name: John S., verified patient
text: He was very dismissive  and told me physical therapy was the only way I can go no cure just do physical therapy

name: Initials hidden
text: I think that Highline orthopedics is certainly competent but the problem is they don't spend enough time with each patient. The schedule is approximately 10 minutes per patient and that sometimes does not leave enough time with the doctor

name: Alexandra L., verified patient
text: Awful bedside manner. Couldn't have made less of an effort. Seemed put out that he had to see a patient. Then walked in on me changing... no knock. Very dismissive and didn't explain findings of ultrasound work.

name: Michael B., verified patient
text: Very courteous and knowledgeable.  Fixed me up right away!  Thank you Dr. Mohrmann!

name: Karsten C., verified patient
text: Dr Mohrmann saw my son right away and had a great bedside manner with both of us.  They quickly X-rayed my son's ankle and diagnosed his fracture.  We received all of this plus crutches and a very comfortable boot within 25 minutes. A pleasant experience all around.

name: Mayer G., verified patient
text: Excellent Doctor

name: Celeste G., verified patient
text: Everything was great and professional but have been requesting materials / exercises for 2 weeks and cant get anyone on call or call back.

name: Initials hidden
text: The entire staff was very friendly and welcoming.  I felt very comfortable and confident in that they will be able to fix my injury.  The x-rays and diagnosis were very quick and to the point.  I have to undergo surgery so this is the extent of my current experience.

name: Emily M., verified patient
text: While Dr. Mohrmann is a bit clinical in tone, he's very clear and was incredibly knowledgable.  He explained in perfectly confident detail what was going on with my hand (I had a slightly torn tendon).

name: Paul J., verified patient
text: Excellent service. Same day appointment. No hassle and courteous. Professional and great bedside manner.

name: Darryl P., verified patient
text: The staff was warm and receptive, very helpful. Everything was exceptional.

name: Olamide N., verified patient
text: The visit was informative and friendly. He didn't seem rushed to leave and heard all of my concerns. Went above and beyond. Exactly what I want from a doctor visit and I'll be returning!

name: Karina U., verified patient
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Mohrmann for a while now and I would highly recommend him.

name: John S., verified patient
text: He was very dismissive  and told me physical therapy was the only way I can go no cure just do physical therapy

name: Initials hidden
text: I think that Highline orthopedics is certainly competent but the problem is they don't spend enough time with each patient. The schedule is approximately 10 minutes per patient and that sometimes does not leave enough time with the doctor

name: Alexandra L., verified patient
text: Awful bedside manner. Couldn't have made less of an effort. Seemed put out that he had to see a patient. Then walked in on me changing... no knock. Very dismissive and didn't explain findings of ultrasound work.

name: Michael B., verified patient
text: Very courteous and knowledgeable.  Fixed me up right away!  Thank you Dr. Mohrmann!

name: Karsten C., verified patient
text: Dr Mohrmann saw my son right away and had a great bedside manner with both of us.  They quickly X-rayed my son's ankle and diagnosed his fracture.  We received all of this plus crutches and a very comfortable boot within 25 minutes. A pleasant experience all around.

name: Dong Eun S., verified patient
text: I was a little worried after reading some negative reviews, but he was great in every possible way during my visit. I'd definitely recommend him!

name: Initials hidden
text: Very professional, answered all my questions.

name: Harvey C., verified patient
text: Excellent

name: Aasim S., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann was very nice, efficient, and helpful. He made me feel comfortable and gave excellent care. Would recommend.

name: Ashley D., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann is always prompt, pleasant, and knowledgeable. Highly recommend.

name: Rachellle N., verified patient
text: Amazing he treated my pained offered OT and explain my pain .. I give him 10 stars

name: Mercedes C., verified patient
text: Amazing! Great team. I arrived early and was seen in a very timely matter. Began treatment right away, with my follow up appointment already set. Looking forward to going back and getting to the root of my problem!  Very satifised.

name: Mayer G., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann is a great doctor and all his staff are lovely people.

text: He was excellent.  Would recommend anyone who needs an ortho to see him.

name: Joan D., verified patient
text: Dr. Mohrmann and his staff were wonderful!

name: J P, verified patient
text: Very pleasant doctor & staff.

name: Patrick I., verified patient
text: Had the benefit of an on-premises x-ray diagnosis that confirmed the latest condition of a wrist injury that had been in a cast for a month resulting in a conservative PT approach. Have been making good progress with the doctor's treatment approach.

name: Lara W., verified patient
text: Fast and efficient.  This was the 4th doctor I had seen since my wrist was broken and this doctor did not make me feel paranoid about not having surgery.

name: Susan Y., verified patient
text: It was a great experience. I went in with a broken finger. He answered all of my questions and concerns, explained the break to me, and had me fitted immediately with a splint and it's already starting to feel better than before. So, all round a great experience.

name: Samantha B., verified patient
text: I have seen him twice now for two different accidents and he is extremely knowledgeable. He did a surgery on my thumb 2 years ago and when I recently injured my finger I looked him up again because I know he is the best

name: Christopher C., verified patient
text:
I was seen by the receptionist upon arrival and was called into the room quickly then seen by the doctor almost immediately.  I was actually out of the office within a half an hour and that was with removing my cast and X-rays.
Always professional!

name: Padmanabhan R., verified patient
text: Went for a followup after a suggested MRI was done. Prior treatment from Dr Mohrmann seems to have cured my issues. Excellent practise.
